# parameterID

**Instance Property**

The parameter ID defining the type of parameter that the curve represents.

## Declaration

```swift
var parameterID: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID { get }
```

## Describing the Curve

- **controlPoints**: An array containing the curve’s control points.
- **relativeTime**: The time at which this parameter curve is applied, relative to the start time of the pattern.
